title: Irrespectiveofits land-use classification under Development Plan, construction of temporary transit tenements made of light detachable material such as tubular / prefabricated light structures shall be allowed upto an FSI of 4
clause_text: Irrespectiveofits land-use classification under Development Plan, construction of temporary transit tenements made of light detachable material such as tubular / prefabricated light structures shall be allowed upto an FSI of 4.0 on any nearby vacant site without any reservation in the Development Plan, with the consent of the land-owner.
section: URS by Private Promoters / MHADA / Co-operative Housing Societies â€“
